content.text:
# List of Rijksmonuments in Drenthe

This is a list of notable Rijksmonuments in Drenthe which have articles on the English Wikipedia. They are listed by municipality.
Aa en Hunze
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Rijksmonument
! Type
! Location
! Description
! Photo
|-
| De Eendracht
| Windmill
| Gieterveen
| A tower mill built in 1904, restored to working order.
|
|-
| Molen van Rolde
| Windmill
| Rolde
| A smock mill built in 1873, restored to working order.
|
|}
